gangs.title: Sons of Norgyr
gangs.description: It was not only a warning that was delivered by the league of Norgyr in M916. M41. Prospector squads were deployed in secret to appraise Necromunda of its value should the imperium fall. The survey complete, the squads return to hive primus to await the next delegation and passage home. Hafnir Ore-Father's crew is one such squad who just need enough creds to buy their way back into Hive City...
